text: Hi team â€” we're seeing ERROR_CODE=KAFKA_403 when trying to publish events from our AWS us-west-2 cluster. This started after we enabled PrivateLink yesterday. Prod only. Can you help? We're Enterprise tier.
Our Snowflake sink integration is failing with 401s. We rotated credentials in Okta and now the connector can't authenticate. Happens in staging and prod. Please advise.
Datadog dashboard for our GCP project us-prod-01 is not showing metrics after we upgraded to the new agent. Can someone check?
Production outage: API returning 503 for all requests in eu-west-1. Started 10 minutes ago. Need immediate help.
How do we configure webhook retries for the Stripe integration? Doc link would be great.
Feature request: can we get an option to export audit logs to S3 in us-east-1?
Critical: All users in prod are seeing 500s on login. This is a complete outage. Sev0.
The BigQuery sync job is failing with permission denied. We're on Team plan. Azure tenant.
We need to add support@acme.com to the Admin role for our org. Using Google Workspace SSO.
Event pipeline delay: events from our Kafka cluster (aws us-west-2) are 15 min behind. Is there an incident?
Documentation link for setting up Okta SCIM provisioning? We're migrating from OneLogin.
Bug: Export to CSV drops rows when the dataset has more than 10k rows. Reproducible in staging.
Sev1 incident: Real-time alerts stopped firing for our project. Prod environment. Need escalation.
Can we get a price quote for upgrading from Team to Enterprise? We need SSO and custom SLAs.
Integration with ServiceNow: does the API support bulk ticket creation? We're on Enterprise.
SSO login is broken for multiple users. Okta shows successful auth but your app returns 500. This is impacting all users in prod (us-east-1). Please treat as urgent.
Need access request: add john.doe@acme.com to Admin role. We're using AzureAD SSO. Also seeing intermittent 'invalid_saml_response' errors.
Users cannot log in via Google OAuth. Getting 'redirect_uri_mismatch' in prod. Need fix ASAP.
Critical incident: All SSO logins failing with 500. Okta side shows success. Entire org blocked. Sev0.
How do we configure JIT provisioning for Azure AD? We need automatic role mapping.
After upgrading Okta we get 'SAML assertion expired' errors. Affecting 20% of users. Prod.
Please add sarah@company.com to Billing Admin. We use OneLogin for SSO.
Login page returns 502 after IdP callback. Started 30 min ago. All regions impacted.
Documentation for setting up SAML with PingFederate? We're migrating from ADFS.
Incident: Users in EMEA getting 'invalid_saml_response' when logging in via Azure AD. Started 1h ago.
We need to disable SSO for a subset of users and use password login only. Is that supported?
Sev1: Okta SCIM sync is failing. New users are not being provisioned. Blocking onboarding.
Add group claim from Azure AD to our app. We need department in the token.
Login loop: users redirected to IdP then back to app then to IdP again. Affects Chrome only.
Can we use multiple IdPs? We have Okta for US and Azure AD for EMEA.
MFA not enforced after SSO. Users can skip MFA step. Security concern.
We were billed twice for Invoice INV-19383 ($4,500 USD) for the Pro plan. Can you refund the duplicate charge?
We want to cancel at the end of the term. What's the pricing to downgrade from Enterprise to Team? Also please confirm the renewal date.
Invoice INV-5522 is overdue but we already paid. Can you check and remove the late fee? Company: Acme Inc.
Need a quote for 500 seats on Enterprise with annual commitment. We're currently on Pro.
We were charged in EUR but our contract says USD. Invoice INV-9912. Please correct and reissue.
Cancel our subscription effective end of month. We're on Team plan. No renewal needed.
Refund request: duplicate charge of $2,400 on 2024-01-15. Card ending 4242. Reference INV-7744.
What are the payment terms for Enterprise? Net-30 or credit card only? We need PO billing.
Pricing page shows $X per seat but we were quoted $Y. Can we get the discounted rate for 200 seats?
Our renewal is coming up. We want to switch from monthly to annual to get the discount. How do we do that?
Invoice INV-1001 missing from our records. We need it for accounting. Company: Beta Corp. Plan: Pro.
We downgraded to Team but were still charged Enterprise rate this month. Please refund the difference.
Do you offer education or nonprofit discounts? We're a university with 1000 users.
Update payment method: replace card on file with new one. Account ID 12345. Keep same billing cycle.
We need a detailed usage report for last quarter for our cost allocation. CSV or API?
Trial ended but we weren't notified. Can we get a 7-day extension to finish evaluation?
